==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
From {{zh-l|卓}}, with the bottom {{zh-l|*十}} replaced by {{zh-l|*木|wood}} to indicate specifically the sense of "table".

===Etymology===
From {{zh-l|卓|high}}, as tables are relatively tall (compared to other furnitures like {{zh-l|*几}}).

Similar descriptive derivations for furnitures include: {{zh-l|*登|to climb}} > {{zh-l|*凳|stool}}; {{zh-l|*倚|to lean}} > {{zh-l|*椅|chair}}.
